events.title: Discovery Request Filed
events.description: Defense attorney Montell Figgins sends a formal discovery request to prosecutors for documents from the United States Inspector General.

keyFacts: This is a formal discovery request in the case 'State of NY v Michael Thomas, et al.', Docket No. 1:19-cr-00830.
The request seeks reports, memorandums, statements, photos, videos, and incident reports from the United States Inspector General.
The letter cites the legal precedent U.S. v. Bryan, 868 F.2d 1032 (1989) to support the request.
The correspondence indicates multiple defendants are involved, as it is copied to counsel for a defendant named Noel.
